amendment.description: To require the Secretary (acting through the Assistant Secretary for Children and Families) to prepare an annual report that contains a determination about whether States have complied with a priority requirement, and to require the Secretary to withhold funds from States that fail to comply with such priority requirement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2845 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2845 proposed by Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2845 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2845 proposed by Senator Vitter.
